main event: A civilian observed a turret-shaped object with rainbow colors in Hamburg, New York in June 1947.
interesting points: The object was observed at sunset and appeared to reflect the sunset colors.,The object was described as fairly small and flying not too high.,Witness reported that the object changed position while retaining its colors.,The speed of the object was noted as faster than a jet plane.,Maneuvers of the object were noted as zigzagging.
